channel.title: [PI] Spawn in varrock on login

item.title: [PI] Spawn in varrock on login
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Hi, Sometimes, after being logged out of the server for a while, you get logged in and your not where you logged out, you’re in varrock square. I have looked through a bunch of my code and all i could find was this.

} else if (token.equals("character-posx")) { p.teleportToX = (Integer.parseInt(token2) <= 0 ? 3210 : Integer.parseInt(token2)); } else if (token.equals("character-posy")) { p.teleportToY = (Integer.parseInt(token2) <= 0 ? 3424 : Integer.parseInt(token2));

where 3210 and 3424 are the coordinates that you log in too. Why does it do this? any idea’s anybody?

Read full topic
